store_info.description_short: Lighting fast with a slick design, Kavita is a rocket fueled digital library which supports a vast array of file formats.
store_info.description_long: Kavita is a fast, feature rich, cross platform reading server. Built with a focus for manga and the goal of being a full solution for all your reading needs.
store_info.hint: You have to create an admin account to use Kavita.
